bot_old_input:

>>>
main_prompt:
Choose 1, 2 or 3 
[1] Crawl - Retrieve messages from telegram and saved them into result.json file.
[2] Download - Downlaod files from telegram including restricted Downlaod.
[3] Exit - Exit from this program. 

>>>
invalid_url: Please send the telegram message url in the form of this - https://CHANNEL_USERNAME/MESSAGE_ID
channel_fail: The Intial and Final message should be in the same channel!
download_notify: Videos are saved on download folder
